name: A Chriftmaf Abroad
description:
made for the FLATGAME-2016 jam, during the january 2017 extension.

semi-autobiographical.

YOU are a piece of ŚLEDZIE.

guide your player//avatar ŚLEDZIE through the five stages of CHRIFTMAF.

there are some bonus stages.

it's a flatgame about ______.

music pairing: "it came upon a midnight clear," kevin macleod
drink pairing: spiked eggnog with nutmeg
